name: A SNOWMASS HAVEN - Walk to LAKE
description:
***Get 1 FREE Kayak / Bike rental and 15% off entire group for additional rentals with this cabin***

"Gorgeous Cabin!  Loved the Gameroom in the loft!  Wonderful woodwork! Beautiful Furniture.  We felt like kings this week!"  The Moores Dec 2017

Enjoy this gorgeous 5 STAR Big Bear Luxury Retreat in a fantastic location. CLOSE to Snow Summit for MOUNTAIN BIKING! (1/4 to shuttle and close to slope!)  Excellent Location.

 LOCATION: CLOSE TO LAKE! WALK TO SKI SHUTTLE STOP! CLOSE TO SKI SLOPES! WITH SKI SLOPE VIEWS. JUST A SHORT WALK 
(a few houses away)  to the Ski Shuttle and the great Restaurants and Shopping. Only 1 mile to SKI SLOPES and 2 miles to Village!

SLEEPS 8-12 people- 3 bedroom, 2 bathrooms

Bedroom 1 - Master Suite with KING Bed -  Jetted Tub in Bathroom  (2 ppl)

Bedroom 2 - 1 QUEEN Bed    (2 ppl) 


Bedroom 3 - 2 QUEEN Beds  ( 4 ppl)  


Loft / Game Room   - 2 QUEEN Futon Beds  (4 ppl)   


WIFI
Full Kitchen
HOT TUB
Natural Gas BBQ
Fireplace
Flat screen TVs throughout
Pool Table 
Shuffle Board Table
Air Hockey
Foosball
Basketball Hoop outside

This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, with NEW HOT TUB,Flat Screen TV's throughout, Large Rock Gas Fireplace, Vaulted Pine Ceilings, Pine wood throughout,  Jetted Tub in the Master Suite and so much more. This beautiful log style home was built in 2003 so you will enjoy plenty of newer upgrades this vacation, from granite counter tops, knotty alder cabinets, jetted tub in the Master Bath, Wooden Floors, Log Railings, Vaulted Wood finished ceiling, Stainless Steel Appliances, Wooden Blinds and so much more. This cabin has a Natural Gas Fireplace (no firewood needed.). 

Beautiful and Bright Loft GAME ROOM, Basketball Hoop and 2 super cool Flat Screen TV's mounted way up high! Unique, Spacious, BRIGHT and fun.  An excellent friend and family getaway! Adjoining extra sleeping area with 2 QUEEN FUTON Sleepers in LOFT. 

NO SMOKING

NO GARAGE ACCESS- 6 CARS maximum

All linens provided 
All homes come with fresh towels and fresh linens and plenty of cozy blankets. Our dedicated cleaning crew has prepared this vacation home for your arrival and will clean upon your departure.

All basic kitchen items provided 


Fenced Yard for pets! Pet Friendly ($35 dog fee/ dog, 2 dog max)
please bring a pet bed to keep pets off furniture.

name: AGGIE'S SKI DEN  - CLOSE to LAKE
description:
*** GET 1 FREE KAYAK / MTN BIKE rental & 15% off entire group for additional rentals with this cabin rental!**

Beautiful Newly remodeled 3 bedroom, 2 full bath. Comfortable, cozy cabin with high vaulted ceilings,  a great get away to relax and enjoy the beautiful mountain air, ski slope views and wonderful pine trees and mountains.
CLOSE to LAKE, VILLAGE and SLOPES. with partial SKI SLOPE VIEWS of the Bear Mountain Slopes, and just 1 miles to the slopes.

Excellent Location
1  mile to Bear Mountain Ski
.4 miles to Golf Course walk across the street
.8 miles to Big Bear Zoo, just down the street, walking distance.

SLEEPS  8 ppl  3 bedroom, 2 Full baths

Bedroom 1     Queen Bed    (down stairs)

Bedroom 2     Full Bed and Full / Twin Bunk Bed 

Bedroom 3     King Bed  loft bedroom upstairs

Wi-Fi
Flat Screen TV
Beautiful Stone, Wood burning fireplace
Full Kitchen with granite counters
Charcoal BBQ

This cabin has beautiful wooden floors throughout, a dining room to seat up to 12, and a comfortable living room with a large L shaped couch. You will find french doors that open to a deck with a small table and chairs. A perfect place to sit and have your morning coffee!

No Smoking 


No Garage Access- 3-4 Cars Maximum

All linens are provided. All vacation homes come with fresh towels and fresh linens and plenty of cozy blankets. Our dedicated cleaning crew has prepared this vacation home for your arrival and will clean upon your departure. 


All basic kitchen items provided

Sorry No Pets Allowed.   

Unfortunately pets are not welcome in this vacation cabin. We have several other cabins that are pet friendly.   Unfortunately, bringing a pet may invoke additional cleaning charges up to $250. Thank you for adhering to our Rental Agreement Policies.

description:
***GET 1 FREE KAYAK / MTN BIKE Rental & 15% off entire group for additional rentals with this cabin rental! ***

Enjoy a swing in the front yard, beneath the shade of wonderful Oak and Pine trees. Relax in your private outdoor HOT TUB in the fenced yard, beneath a sky filled with stars!

Excellent  LOCATION Close to LAKE & Village!  just 2 blocks to SUMMIT Resorts Ski Shuttle.  WALK to  Summit Chalet Ski Shuttle and to MEADOW PARK 1/2 mile away.  WALK to SKI SHUTTLE for Snow Summit (2 Blocks on Brownie Lane)

SLEEPS 6-8 - 3 bedroom, 2 bath  1600 sq ft.
 Downstairs Bedroom- 1 QUEEN  with 1 Full Bath  (2 ppl)
Upstairs Bedroom 2-  KING Bed with TV and a deck with beautiful tree views  (2 ppl)
Upstairs Bedroom 3- 2 Twin beds   (2 ppl)
Downstairs- extra sleeping on sleeper sofa (2 ppl)
Upstairs 2nd Bathroom- shower with toilet and sink

FENCED YARD
WI-FI
HOT TUB 
FIREPLACE
FLAT SCREEN TV
CHARCOAL BBQ

Open Floor plan with Living Room adjoins Dining Room and Kitchen, with seating for 6 at the table, couch seating for 5 to 8, with additional seating.

NO SMOKING

NO GARAGE ACCESS- 3 CARS maximum

All homes come with fresh towels and beds are made up and ready for you with fresh linens and plenty of cozy blankets. Our dedicated cleaning crew has the home clean and ready for you before your visit and does the cleaning for you after your stay.

name: BEARS ZEN - LAKE & VILLAGE
description:
***1 FREE KAYAK / MTN BIKE Rental & 15% off entire group for additional rentals with this cabin rental!***

This is a fantastic 4 bedroom, 3 bath, 2 story retreat, with private Hot Tub and views! Walking distance to the VILLAGE and close to the SKI SLOPES! With Pool Table, WiFi,  and even an Massage Table!  Just bring the Masseuse!  Expansive decking, charcoal BBQ and so much more! The front of the home has a wrap-a-round deck for you to sit back, relax and enjoy the Big Bear sunsets.  Have the benefit of it all on your vacation and enjoy your stay in this fantastic home which is just above the Village shops, restaurants and marina, plus those views! Just minutes by car to either Snow Summit or Bear Mountain Ski Resort! Whatever the reason, you have just found one great vacation destination!   

The Bear's Zen, formerly known as the Knickerbocker Lodge, is all about location, convenience, luxury and family fun. Backing up to the National Forest this home is close to everything. Just steps to a beautiful hiking trail 2N08 and just a few blocks from the Big Bear VILLAGE, with shopping and dining and entertainment and minutes to the lake area or the slopes at Snow Summit!

SLEEPS 11- 4 bedroom, 3 bath
Bedroom 1  QUEEN  Master with Flat Screen,  Spacious Bathroom with MASSAGE TABLE  and private balcony with views while enjoying your massage!
Bedroom 2  KING large spacious room
Bedroom 3  QUEEN Bed and a BUNK BED  (Twin and Full)
Bedroom 4  FULL Bed

WiFi
FLAT SCREEN TV's
BLUE RAY/DVD PLAYER
WOOD BURNING FIREPLACE
POOL TABLE
HOT TUB
MASSAGE TABLE
BEAUTIFUL DECK
CHARCOAL BBQ  
WASHER/DRYER

Have the benefit of it all on your vacation and enjoy your stay in this fantastic home which is just above the Village shops, restaurants and marina, plus those views! 

Incredible trees, distant lake view and it looks like a mountain model home.  Enter into your vacation home on the 1st level to a magnificent living room with a wood burning stove fireplace, TV/DVD/Wireless Internet, extra dining table including a pool table and access to the expansive front deck with patio seating, BBQ and sweeping trees and forest views.

The fully equipped and decorated kitchen includes a Viking range, all stainless steel appliances, and plenty of room for all the chefs to have fun and work their culinary magic together.  Head over to the formal dining area that seats eight with treed views to enjoy.  Have the use and the convenience of the barbecue located on the front deck patio. Off the living room is located the media room with large flat screenTV/Blu-Ray DVD and comfy furnishings. 

This second level offers three wonderful bedrooms and another full bathroom situated in the hallway; the first bedroom offers a queen size bed and the second bedroom is set up with a full size bed. The 3rd bedroom offers a full size bed and a bunk bed set (lower bed is full ) plus access out to the side deck and spa. The beautifully decorated master suite is located upstairs on the third level with a queen size bed, huge master bath with a massage table, flat screen TV and DVD. A private balcony off the suite provides access to enjoy the amazing Bear Bear Lake Mountain and distance lake views.

NO SMOKING

NO GARAGE ACCESS- 6 CARS maximum

All linens provided 
All homes come with fresh towels and fresh linens and plenty of cozy blankets. Our dedicated cleaning crew has prepared this vacation home

All basic kitchen items provided 

Pet Friendly ($35 pet fee) please bring a pet bed to keep pets off furniture.

name: BIT of HEAVEN - SLOPES, Golf Course
description:
***1 FREE KAYAK / MTN BIKE Rental & 15% off entire group for additional rentals with this cabin rental!*** 

2 story, 2 bedroom, plus LOFT,  2 bath, 1,300 sq ft with off street parking!

GREAT VALUE CABIN! Cute! Hot Tub! Beautiful NEW TREX Deck (easy on the feet)  for lounging outside and beneath the stars.Excellent Location with Golf Course Views.  Nice NEW WOODEN Floors. Dogs welcome!  FENCED YARD for pets, with BOAT and RV STORAGE in yard. The perfect ski and lake  cabin at an excellent price! 

Close to LAKE, Village and Golf Course. Next to golf course.  Large, corner lot.

SLEEPS 6 to 8 ppl- 2 bedroom, 2 bath
Bedroom 1 - King bed in Master with Bathroom  (upstairs)
Loft Bedroom - 1  Queen Sofa Sleeper and a futon (upstairs)
Bedroom 2 -   Queen (downstairs)
2nd bathroom on main floor across from bedroom.

WI-FI
2 Flat Screen TV 
GAS FIREPLACE (NO NEED FOR WOOD!)
HUGE FENCED BACKYARD (Great for your dog!)
CHARCOAL BBQ  (Gas BBQ NOT available - DO NOT PLACE CHARCOAL in Gas BBQ)
WASHER/DRYER
NICE DECK
VAULTED CEILINGS
RV and BOAT PARKING if needed

Cozy Ski Cabin with Vaulted Pine Ceilings. Living room with vaulted pine ceilings and large wall of windows to let in the sunlight,  plenty of windows with a beautiful view,  Gas Fireplace (no need for wood), Swiss Chalet Style LOFT has additional sleeping with 1 Queen pull out couch and a futon and a Flat Screen TV. Kitchen is Open and Connected  to living room and has a dishwasher, gas stove, microwave, dishwasher. Secure Storage Spot for Bikes and Skis.

NO SMOKING

NO GARAGE ACCESS- 6 CARS maximum

All linens provided 
All homes come with fresh towels and fresh linens and plenty of cozy blankets. Our dedicated cleaning crew has prepared this vacation home for your arrival and will clean upon your departure.

All basic kitchen items provided 

Pet Friendly ($35 pet fee) please bring a pet bed to keep pets off furniture.

description:
***1 FREE KAYAK or MTN BIKE & 15% off entire group for additional rentals with this cabin rental!***

Breckenridge Ski Chalet is located in an upscale ski neighborhood close to everything, SKI SLOPES, the VILLAGE, SHOPPING, DINING and more. Have a large group up to 20 people, a neighboring vacation rental that accommodates up to 12 people can be combined for a total of 20 PLUS in these 2 homes.

Less than 1 mile to LAKE, VILLAGE. HIKING, BIKING, LAKE and more! This beautiful pine tree escape is located 1 block from the Ski Shuttle for Summit Mtn and locate 1 mile to the SUMMIT SKI SLOPES, great for summer HIKING & BIKING.

SLEEPS 10 to 12 ppl- 4 bedroom, 2 bath 
Bedroom 1  Master Suite with KING BED and private Bathroom   with TV  (2 ppl)  

Bedroom 2  Queen Bed and Twin Bed  with TV   (2 - 3 ppl )

Living room - 1 sleeper sofa ( 2 ppl )

HOT TUB
WOOD BURNING FIREPLACE
4 FLAT SCREEN TV's
POOL TABLE
FENCED BACK YARD Natural Gas BBQ (DO NOT PLACE CHARCOAL in Gas BBQ)
WASHER/DRYER

Enjoy a private HOT TUB in the fenced in backyard with a large entertaining deck, Wi-Fi, BBQ, large landscaped yard and beautiful tall pine trees. This home is in a perfect location for hikers, bikers and  riders with snow summit just around the corner. Walk conveniently to snow Summit ski shuttle, restaurants and markets. This home is built for entertaining.

name: CANYON CREST VIEW - Close to Lake
description:
***1 SNOWBOARD / SKI Rental & 15% off entire group for additional rentals with this cabin rental!***

SKI SLOPE VIEWS from Hot Tub! Breathtaking Views from this Cabin nestled in the trees! You will truly feel "away from it all" yet it's so close - to the LAKE and the Ski Slopes! 

Relax in your NEWer large HOT TUB while enjoying the  gorgeous SKI Slope View! Moonridge location, close to the slopes!  Incredible ski slope views from the living room. Flat Screen TV. WIFI. Fireplace. Everything you will need at an awesome price!  Enjoy this perfect Lake & Ski Cabin for your next adventure to Big Bear.  Pets are welcome inside and out with a FENCED YARD to roam freely.   (There is a flight of stairs to access this cabin)

LOCATION: Super Close to Ski Slopes and Lake. 2 MILES to LAKE and VILLAGE,Dining, Shopping and more! 

SLEEPS 6 - 3 bedroom, 1 1/2 bath

Bathrooms- 1 full (bath and shower) on lower bedroom level 
1/2  bath upstairs

Bedroom 1  - Queen  

Bedroom 2 -  Queen

Bedroom 3 - 1 Bunk (Double bottom / Twin top)   

NEW HOT TUB
GREAT VIEWS
WIFI
FLAT SCREEN TV
WOOD BURNING FIREPLACE
FENCED YARD (Great for dogs!)
CHARCOAL BBQ
SPACIOUS DECK
WASHER/DRYER

Enjoy a large rock fireplace in the living room, bright sunlight shining in and  breathtaking views of the ski slopes and nearby mountains while relaxing in your living room. FLAT SCREEN TV and WIFI are there for some indoor entertaining. Vaulted wood beam Ceilings add to the cuteness of this cabin.

Relax on the spacious deck with a morning cup of coffee and take in the AMAZING VIEWS of the surrounding mountains, ski slopes and beautiful trees. The night lights of the slopes is a spectacular view as well. 

Spacious kitchen with seating for 6. Full Kitchen with Refrigerator, Dishwasher + Washer/Dryer.  Dine with a view of the mountains and slopes. Sliding glass doors connect the kitchen to the outdoor patio deck, where more beautiful views of the outdoors and the quiet sounds of Big Bear await you.  

A spacious HOT TUB sits on the deck.  Relax beneath the stars or take an early morning.

THERE IS A FLIGHT OF STAIRS TO ACCESS THIS CABIN

NO SMOKING

NO GARAGE ACCESS- 3 cars maximum

name: FAWNSKIN LAKE CHALET
description:
Fresh NEW Upgrades! 
** 1 FREE KAYAK / MTN BIKE Rental & 15% off entire group for additional rentals with this cabin rental! ***

Enjoy a beautiful view of Pine Trees surrounding the area. Fresh new UPGRADES throughout. New Appliances. New Flooring throughout, (a well loved cabin for you to enjoy.) This house has plenty of room for all to enjoy, inside and out. Bright and Spacious, with a relaxing Hot Tub on the deck, a 52" Flat Screen SATELLITE TV, and nice selection of DVD movies and CD's for added enjoyment!  There is a flight of stairs to climb to access the vacation cabin.  NO INTERNET at this cabin.

Captain John's Marina (1/2 mile from cabin.) Escape in the beautiful Trees throughout the property with relaxing views, it's a true get away! 

LOCATION: 1/2 mile to lake and Captain John's Marina, Brewery, North Shore Cafe, Lake, Discovery Center and quaint town of Fawnskin. North side of the lake. 4 Miles to SKI SLOPES!

SLEEPS 8 - 3 bedroom, 3 bath

Master Bedroom 1 - 1 King  (2 ppl)

FLAT SCREEN TV
DVD PLAYER & SATELLITE TV
CHARCOAL BBQ
NICE DECK
WASHER/DRYER

A Great 3 Bedroom 3 bath spacious cabin in beautiful Fawnskin. Plenty of space throughout, with a spacious living area with high vaulted ceilings and an extra large family room that makes up the 3rd bedroom. Full featured cabin with all amenities, Kitchen, Cable, 52" Plasma FLAT SCREEN Satellite TV, DVD.

There is a flight of stairs to climb to access the vacation cabin.

name: FOUR SEASONS SKI HAUS
description:
***1 FREE SKI / SNOWBOARD Rental and 15% off additional rentals (Ask us how)***

Private Hot Tub!  Gas Fire Pit (Natural Gas!) WALK to LAKE, close to VILLAGE, walk to SUMMIT SKI SLOPE SHUTTLE! Best Location! Enjoy this beautifully modern Ski cabin with a rustic feel of the outdoors, with natural wood finishing details throughout. You will love the feel and location of this beauty!

The cabin is beautiful, rustic Big Bear at it's finest.  A place to come relax, get away from the hectic city and appreciate the beauty of the mountains. The outdoors and inside of the cabin are decorated to make you feel like you stepped back in time yet retains the modern furnishings.

Walk everywhere!! Walk to Summit Shuttle Parking Lot!  No need to drive your car, just 300 yards is a place where Snow Summit provides free shuttles.  Or you can walk to snow summit--it's just around the corner. Walk to HIKING, FOREST, SKI SLOPE, and more.  During the summer ride your mountain bike to Snow Summit and catch the lift to the top of the mountain then ride the bike down hill.  

SLEEPS 8- 3 bedroom, 2 bath

Bedroom 1 QUEEN Bed  - 2 ppl

Bedroom 2 QUEEN Bed plus twin bed - 3 ppl

Bedroom 3 QUEEN Bed   2 ppl

SOFA SLEEPER Queen in living room - 2 ppl

WI-FI
HOT TUB
NATURAL GAS FIRE PIT
CHARCOAL BBQ
FIREPLACE
FENCED YARD (Great for pets!)
BEAUTIFUL LANDSCAPE
OUTDOOR PING PONG TABLE ( May-Oct.)

Formal dining room table with six wooden decorative chairs & an additional card table with 4 chairs

Beautiful wood burning Rock and Stone Fireplace (that heats well) with a gorgeous rustic white fur log mantle engraved by beetles to create a spectacular piece of custom wood.

Enjoy the beautiful GREAT ROOM with full log beams carved by the bark beetles, major bark beetles. All logs used in the ceilings were harvested in the Big Bear San Bernardino Forest, as a result of the bark beetle era infestation that resulted in hundreds of dead trees. Check out the bluing on each beam, it's pretty cool. The seating for the living room is one love seat and one couch. 

Picturesque - Let's start in the backyard. Plenty of space to lounge around in the Jacuzzi, fire pit area, under the pergola with patio seating to play some board games or a deck of cards. During September/October the back yard is bursting with fall colors, reds, yellow, green, it's gorgeous.  The front yard is big enough to play a game of catch.  During the winter it's perfect to make snow angels and snowmen. This quiet residential neighborhood with plenty of beautiful trees, is great to walk around the block especially while it is snowing. 

NO SMOKING

NO GARAGE ACCESS- 3 CARS maximum

All linens provided

All basic kitchen items provided.

name: GOLD MOUNTAIN CHALET - FOREST & LAKE
description:
***1 FREE KAYAK & MTN BIKE Rental and 15% off additional rentals (Ask us how)***

Close to LAKE and just steps to National Forest! PRIVATE HOT TUB!  STEPS into the National Forest!  Excellent Location!  Close to LAKE, Village, Hiking!

Gold Mountain Chalet has gone GREEN, utilizing SOLAR POWER on the GRID energy. (*see below for more details)

Enjoy beautiful views of the surrounding mountains, ski slopes, forest and valleys, right from your living room. Wonderful (distant) views of Snow Summit Ski Slope can be taken in from the living room, patio, master bed and hot tub.  This spacious cabin is located in an upscale residential neighborhood, close to everything yet gives you the feel of being oh so far away from it all.

LOCATION:  Great Location steps from the NATIONAL FOREST where beautiful hiking trails await you. approx. 4 miles to SNOW SUMMIT. Great Views!  approx. 3 miles to Shopping.
Located in Big Bear on Gold Mountain and Hwy 18. Approximately 4 ish miles to ski slopes, 3 miles to the North Shore Boat Launch and Fishing dock, 1 mile to the Big Bear City Airport, Near the national forest and very close to hiking and jeep trails.

SLEEPS 10 to 12 - 4 bedroom, 3 bath

Master Bedroom 1 -  Master bedroom/bath-  Queen Bed (sleeps 2)
(has exclusive private access to outdoor HOT TUB on deck. Master bath has a relaxing garden tub.

Bedroom 2  - Queen bed (sleeps 2)

Bedroom 3  - Queen bed (sleeps 2)

Bedroom 4  - Bunk bed. Full / Twin  (sleeps 3)

2 Futons in Living room (sleeps 4)

WI-FI
HOT TUB
FLAT SCREEN TV
BLU RAY PLAYER
WET BAR
SPACIOUS DECK
WOOD BURNING FIREPLACE
FOOSBALL
AIR HOCKEY
CHARCOAL BBQ
CLOSE TO HIKING
WASHER/DRYER

If you like hiking or a simple walk in the forest with your kids or your dog, this is the perfect spot! Just a few houses away from National Forest and plenty of hiking trails for all to enjoy. Enjoy an easy stroll with the kids or an excellent workout!

GREEN / SOLAR POWERED Chalet
Gold Mountain Chalet has gone GREEN, utilizing SOLAR POWER on the GRID energy. YES, it's one of a few of our homes that harness the power of the sun!  This wonderful cabin has a large solar array installed which supplies all and more of its power for the year.  AND, in the event that this cabin needs to use more electricity that the sun can power, then it can access it's power from the local electric company because it's GRID TIED. AND, any excess energy that is generated from the solar power panels gets returned to the local electric company and is given back!

NO SMOKING

NO AIR CONDITIONING

NO GARAGE ACCESS- 6 CARS maximum

All linens provided 
All homes come with fresh towels and fresh linens and plenty of cozy blankets. Our dedicated cleaning crew has prepared this vacation home for your arrival and will clean upon your departure.

All basic kitchen items provided.
